about_the_game:
Pixel Puzzles Musical is a new and unique way to experience your favourite music and your favourite puzzle game simultaneously.

This release brings the aggressive, evolving music of Chaosbay to Pixel Puzzles.

Prog, Djent, Core, Pop. CHAOSBAY from Berlin/Germany have kept the metal world in suspense. Hardly any other band combines virtuoso prog metalcore with radio-ready hooks in such a unique way. Now they are pushing the boundaries of modern alternative metal again. Known for their tireless work ethic, the band once again creates a masterpiece of timeless metal composition that guarantees both headbanging and frenetic sing-alongs. Super-heavy riffing and screaming meets angel-like vocals and powerful melodies.

PACK INFO:

Music Tracks: 6
Puzzle Count: 11
Total Piece Count: 2579

TRACKS:

  • Track 1 - New Age
  • Track 2 - Passenger
  • Track 3 - Billion
  • Track 4 - What Is War
  • Track 5 - All This Beauty Can´t Be Real
  • Track 6 - Home

PACK CONTENTS:

  • Puzzle 1 - 216
  • Puzzle 2 - 140
  • Puzzle 3 - 140
  • Puzzle 4 - 330
  • Puzzle 5 - 425
  • Puzzle 6 - 330
  • Puzzle 7 - 216
  • Puzzle 8 - 96
  • Puzzle 9 - 140
  • Puzzle 10 - 330
  • Puzzle 11 - 216
